# Sizings

## Tokens

<SizingTokens />

## Usage in CSS

Whenever you want to apply this style, you can use the corresponding variable.

```css
.myClass {
  width: var(--sizing-xs);
}
```

## Usage with TailwindCSS

Whenever you want to use a sizing from Grapes with TailwindCSS, you can use the corresponding keys.

Example with width:

<SizingTailwind />

See documentation from TailwindCSS: [https://tailwindcss.com/docs/width](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/width).
